query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as "count!"
        FROM criminal_cases
        WHERE court_id = $1
          AND ($2::TEXT IS NULL OR status = $2)
          AND ($3::TEXT IS NULL OR crime_type = $3)
          AND ($4::TEXT IS NULL OR priority = $4)
          AND ($5::TEXT IS NULL OR title ILIKE $5 OR case_number ILIKE $5)
